select b.*, DATE_FORMAT(b.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.COMPLETE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') completeTime, a.USER_REAL_NAME yiName
from yuyue_change_money b,yuyue_merchant a WHERE 1=1 and b.merchantId = a.ID and b.changeNo = #{changeNo} and b.tradeType = #{tradeType} and CONCAT(a.USER_REAL_NAME) like concat('%', #{yiName}, '%') and CONCAT(b.mobile) like concat('%', #{mobile}, '%') and b.status = #{status} and CONCAT(b.note) like concat('%', #{note}, '%')
and DATE_FORMAT(b.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(b.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY b.CREATE_TIME DESC
